summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing transportation charges for a shipment associated with Jeffrey Epstein. It includes information about discounts applied, total charges, and shipment details such as pickup and delivery dates.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the sender of a shipment, with details of the transportation charges associated with his account.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is mentioned as the recipient of a shipment sent by Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: D. Oakley
persons.context: D. Oakley is referenced in relation to a discount applied to the shipment charges.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is sending a shipment to Ghislaine Maxwell, indicating a personal or business relationship.
D. Oakley is associated with providing a discount on the shipment charges for Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Shipment Pickup
events.description: A shipment was picked up by FedEx on November 1, 2002, associated with Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Shipment Delivery
events.description: The shipment was delivered on November 4, 2002, to Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated November 18, 2002, and details transportation charges of $14.37.
The shipment was picked up on November 1, 2002, and delivered on November 4, 2002.
Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the sender, while Ghislaine Maxwell is the recipient of the shipment.
A discount of $3.18 was applied to the total charges for the shipment.
D. Oakley is mentioned in relation to the discount provided on the shipment.
